page.title: 14Clubs in Stone and Oulton
page.content: There is a Scout Pack called The 1st Oulton Pack which serves the village of Oulton.Also there are the 1st Stone Christ Church, the 2nd Stone St. Dominic's and the 5th Stone Saint Michael's packs which meet in Stone.If you are a girl and you are seven years old you can start at the Brownies.When you are 10 years old you can go to Guides. Some of the Brownies meet at Westbridge Park.The 5th Stone Brownies go to Westbridge Park on Wednesdays. They meet at 6.00pm. till 7.30pm. There is a German Shepherd Dog training school in Stone.Other clubs include the Air Training Corps, the Army Cadet Force, the Stone Bridge Club,the Townswomen's Guild, Garden & Allotment Associations, the Stone Gramophone Society, the Rotary Club etc., the Stone Royal Naval Association and the R.A.F. Association.
